name: agile-dashboard-widgets
title: Agile Dashboard Widgets
description: A set of dashboard widgets that provide various agile board views. The set includes widgets for viewing the status of an agile board, a burndown chart, or a cumulative flow diagram for a sprint.

widgets.name: Agile Chart
widgets.description: Displays the burndown chart or cumulative flow diagram associated with a specific agile board in YouTrack.

widgets.name: Agile Board Status
widgets.description: Displays the progress indicator for columns from an agile board in YouTrack.
